events.title: We take online education to another level.

events.description: During the pre-work you learn some basic CSS and HTML, and hopefully how to use the flex-box to create simple layouts.

previewModules.title: Take a look at the most relevant modules of our coding bootcamp

list.title: HTML/CSS
list.description: During the pre-work you learn some basic CSS and HTML, and hopefully how to use the flex-box to create simple layouts. The first day we will review the pre-work completion and introduce a more evolved CSS that enables spectacular layouts and the amazing Bootstrap framework that will make your life so much easier with the "component oriented" approach.

steps.title: Start with the basics
steps.text: During the pre-work you learn some basic CSS and HTML, and hopefully how to use the flex-box to create simple layouts. The first day we will review the pre-work completion and introduce a more evolved CSS that enables amazing layouts and the spectacular Bootstrap framework that will make your life so much easier with the "component oriented" approach.
